original_title: Fünfter Akt, siebente Szene. Fritz Kortner probt Kabale und Liebe
overview: This documentation of a Kortner stage rehearsal shows in detail and fascinatingly how Kortner developed psychological tensions with meticulous precision in linguistic expression and gestural construction.
title: Fünfter Akt, siebente Szene. Fritz Kortner probt Kabale und Liebe
